title: Innovating Language Instructional Design with Generative AI and Autoethnographic Approaches: Enhancing Text, Writing, and Reading Comprehension Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of instructional design and AI technology, specialized knowledge in linguistics (grammatical structures, text analysis skills, communication strategies, etc.)
context.additional_context: For learners in managerial/leadership roles, strengthening instructional design competencies using generative AI through real-world language education cases (reading strategies, writing feedback, communication activities). Focuses on text-based learning analysis and expressive skill development.

learning_goals: Learners will design language education content development processes (text structure analysis, writing material generation, etc.) using generative AI tools
Learners will apply autoethnographic research methodologies to analyze AI-integrated language education cases and write reflective reports focusing on reading strategies and expressive techniques

resources: Access to Generative AI Platform API

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
